rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
No moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Describes how data would be gathered, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a planned future capability/measure ('Data on how well the vaccines actually protect... would be gathered in real-time').
